translation.en: Oh, I haven't seen this.
Oh, I love this cat!
Oh my god, Mai. Do something about your hair.
translation.de: Oh Gott, Mai. Kümmer dich um deine Haare.

translation.en: I like it this way.
Seriously, does everything have to be a robot with you?
translation.de: Muss für dich alles ein Roboter sein?

translation.en: -Oh, come on. It's cute. -[brush laughs]
I'll do it myself.
You know, it's not going to kill you to accept a little help.
[Mai's mother] You're not in this alone.
Somebody needs a makeover!
[Mai] Get this-- Get off me.
Oh, stop being so dramatic.
I can do it myself!
-Happy? -You look nice, Mai.
[brush] Yeah, cool. I'll be waiting here in the car.
-Off you go. -Goodbye. See ya.
[robot] Voilà.
[girl] You can see monkey fighters.
Friendly reminder: all children must be accompanied by an adult.
translation.de: Kinder müssen von einem Erwachsenen begleitet werden.

translation.en: [Mai's mother] Aren't you so excited?
[Mai] You didn't tell me there was gonna be a line.
translation.de: Du sagtest nichts von einer Schlange.

translation.en: Come on, Mai. The new Gen 6 is going to make this old thing obsolete.
translation.de: Der neue Gen 6 wird das Ding hier überflüssig machen.

translation.en: Oh, um...
-[Mai's mother] Sorry. -Not a problem.
The Gen 6's slightly bigger screen will complete you emotionally
translation.de: Der größere Bildschirm des Gen 6 wird Sie zufriedenstellen,

translation.en: -in ways I never could. -[gasps]
It's cool, you love robots more than you love me.
translation.de: Es ist toll, du liebst Roboter mehr als mich.

translation.en: Totally get it.
-What's that honey? -[grunts]
Just super excited about the awesome robots, mom.
translation.de: Ich bin bloß aufgeregt wegen der coolen Roboter.

translation.en: -Mom. Mom. Molly. Mom! -Mm-hmm?
Is it cool if I go check out the stadium? Oh, it's got a headphone jack.
translation.de: -Kann ich zum Stadion gehen? -Er hat Kopfhörerstecker.

translation.en: -[man moans] -My bad.
My shoes.
[Mai] Sorry, but not sorry.
[Mai] Sorry.
Excuse me, miss. You appear to be going down the up escalator.
translation.de: Entschuldigung. Sie scheinen falsch herum zu gehen.

translation.en: May I suggest instead you go up the up escalator
translation.de: Bitte gehen Sie diese Rolltreppe hoch

translation.en: or down the down es--
translation.de: oder die nach unten nach unten.

translation.en: No, no. No, thank you.
Oh, please don't do that. No.
translation.de: Tun Sie das bitte nicht. Aua.

translation.en: Now, this is not being regular.
-Can we just talk about this? -[Mai] Shut it.
[flying robot] Why don't we talk to my supervisor?
translation.de: Wir sollten mit meinem Supervisor sprechen.

translation.en: Woah!
[announcer over P.A.] IQ Robotic presents Tectonic Activity
translation.de: IQ Robotik präsentiert Tectonic Activity, im Kampf gegen den einzig Wahren.

translation.en: facing up against the Wild Chickens for 20 rounds. Play-off madness!
translation.de: IQ Robotik präsentiert Tectonic Activity, im Kampf gegen den einzig Wahren. ZEIT FÜR LASER

translation.en: -No, wait. -Okay.
Move, move. Come on.
Ma'am, if you would refer to our sales brochure
you will find that a number of models incorporate amazing personal transportation options.
translation.de: in dem Sie viele Modelle mit Transportoption finden.

translation.en: I, however, am not one!
[flying robot] Falling down!
Friendly reminder, all children must be accompanied by an adult.
translation.de: Kinder müssen von einem Erwachsenen begleitet werden.

translation.en: -You're coming with me, young lady. -What?
translation.de: -Du kommst mit mir mit, junge Dame. -Was?

translation.en: You're just making it harder for yourself. -And me. -[electricity arcing]
translation.de: Du machst es uns beiden nur schwerer.

translation.en: Hey, get back here you little...
-[siren whooping] -I said-- What?
You're not allowed in there. Uh...
[security robot] Oh, fudge.
[man in the background] The first true learning AI--
-[robot] Not the first. -Yes, not the first.
translation.de: -Die erste lernende KI... -Nicht die erste. Nicht die erste, aber diese funktioniert.

translation.en: But we've done it right this time.
translation.de: Nicht die erste, aber diese funktioniert.

translation.en: -Great, let's get him out of here. -No!
He has too much to learn before he is ready for the job
translation.de: Er muss noch viel lernen für den Job,

translation.en: we so desperately need him to perform.
Okay, gotta go.
You are my last and best hope. My project 77.
translation.de: Du bist meine letzte und beste Hoffnung. Mein Projekt 77.

translation.en: -You said, "remind me at two o'clock." -You're not perfect.
translation.de: -Ich sollte Sie um zwei erinnern... -Du bist nicht perfekt,

translation.en: But then perfect is the enemy of good. Isn't it?
translation.de: aber perfekt ist der Feind von gut. Nicht wahr?

translation.en: -Because it's two o'clock. -Oh, my--
translation.de: -Es ist zwei Uhr. -Gib mir noch eine Minute.

translation.en: Would you just give me a minute? Okay? One minute!
translation.de: -Es ist zwei Uhr. -Gib mir noch eine Minute. Eine Minute. Hast du eine Idee, wie gefährlich er ist?

translation.en: Do you have any idea how dangerous what we built is?
translation.de: Eine Minute. Hast du eine Idee, wie gefährlich er ist?

translation.en: It's kind of a big deal. Let me check. Yeah. It's one of the biggest deals ever.
translation.de: Das ist eine der größten Sachen aller Zeiten.

translation.en: [robot] How about a "thanks for the reminder, Alfredo"?
[scientist] Thank you for the reminder. I know.
-[gasps] -[robot] Hello.
-Wha-- Hey! Oh my God. -What's your name?
[Mai] Stupid robot.
[robot] Hello, Stupid Robot. What's this for?
translation.de: Hallo, Dämlicher Roboter. Wofür ist das?

translation.en: No, you're the stupid robot.
[robot] I'm the stupid robot? Is Dr. Rice coming back?
translation.de: Ich bin der dämliche Roboter? Kommt Dr. Rice zurück?

translation.en: -Come on. Let go of my bag. -Okay.
-Woah, what are you doing? -I'm following you.
That is super creepy.
I mean, really. What are you thinking?
We hang out, become best buds, take on the world,
translation.de: Wir hängen rum, werden Freunde, erobern die Welt,

translation.en: share a deep and moving journey of discovery together?
-Okay. -Yeah, you are delusional.
-[siren chirps] -[security robot] Hey! You're definitely not allowed in there sweetheart.
translation.de: Du hast hier nichts zu suchen, Süße.

translation.en: -I'm not your-- -Quit squirming.
-[Mai] My backpack! I need it! -[security robot] Come on, now.
[announcer over P.A.] Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, liebe Presse,

translation.en: members of the press, please welcome to the stage
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, liebe Presse, begrüßen Sie mit mir den Mitgründer und CEO von IQ Robotik,

translation.en: co-founder and CEO of IQ Robotic,
translation.de: begrüßen Sie mit mir den Mitgründer und CEO von IQ Robotik,

translation.en: Let's give them a show.
-Mom, can we go now? -Ah!
Shh! Honey, Mommy needs to see this.
[Justin] Can you hear me all right? How are you doing?
translation.de: Können Sie mich hören? Wie geht's?

translation.en: Great! Great!
[girl in the crowd] I love you!
Hey, check out those tech specs, huh? Pretty impressive.
translation.de: Sehen Sie sich diese Daten an!

translation.en: Even I'm impressed and I work here, so... [chuckles]
translation.de: Selbst ich bin beeindruckt und ich arbeite hier.

translation.en: Folks, this year's lineup is kinda perfect if I do say so myself.
translation.de: Das diesjährige Lineup ist perfekt, wenn ich das so sagen darf.

translation.en: It really is. But I've got a question.
translation.de: Wirklich. Aber ich habe eine Frage.

translation.en: Are you guys ready to see the next big thing?
translation.de: Sind Sie bereit für das nächste große Ding?

translation.en: -[crowd exclaims] -Yeah?
Well in that case, let me just say this, what is past is prologue, folks.
translation.de: Dann merken Sie sich eins: Die Vergangenheit war der Prolog.

translation.en: And this is the beginning of a new world.
translation.de: Dies ist der Beginn einer neuen Welt.

translation.en: -I believe, a better world. -[crowd applauds]
[Justin] Brought to you by the geniuses here at the IQ Robotic.
translation.de: Von unseren Genies hier bei IQ Robotik.

translation.en: And I am super proud of what we've accomplished here.
translation.de: Ich bin sehr stolz auf unsere Leistung.

translation.en: The way I see it, this is the last Q-Bot you will ever need.
translation.de: Wenn Sie mich fragen, der letzte Q-Bot, den Sie brauchen werden.

translation.en: -[man in the crowd] Yeah! -So, let's hear it for the new Gen 6!
[Justin] Yeah.
I know, right? Gorgeous!
Well, this is it folks. This is my end game.
translation.de: Das ist es. Alles, wofür ich jemals arbeitete, führte zu diesem Moment

translation.en: Everything I have ever done has led up to this moment.
translation.de: Alles, wofür ich jemals arbeitete, führte zu diesem Moment

translation.en: To this wonder of technology.
And boy, is it a winner!
Hey, but you know who the real winners are?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, wer wahre Gewinner sind?

translation.en: It's all of you.
-[crowd cheers] -Yes, it is us.
I love him!
He really gets me.
-[crowd continues cheering] -Please.
Ladies and gentlemen, we've entered an age
translation.de: Wir sind in einem Zeitalter beispiellosem Komforts

translation.en: of unprecedented convenience and connectivity.
translation.de: Wir sind in einem Zeitalter beispiellosem Komforts und Vernetzung, eine globale Community, ermöglicht durch die IQ Robotik Q-Bots.

translation.en: A real global community, facilitated by the IQ Robotic Q-Bots.
translation.de: und Vernetzung, eine globale Community, ermöglicht durch die IQ Robotik Q-Bots.

translation.en: -And listen... -[crowd cheering] I know, I know.
I'm not embarrassed to say, I want all of you addicted to these guys.
translation.de: Ich bin ehrlich, wenn ich sage, dass Sie alle süchtig werden sollen.

translation.en: Why not, right?
They're going to change the world.
Thank you!
Ladies and gentlemen, Justin Pin thanks your for your support.
translation.de: Verehrtes Publikum, Justin Pin dankt Ihnen für die Unterstützung.

translation.en: To show his appreciation, he'll be giving everyone here...
translation.de: Als Dankeschön schenkt er allen hier

translation.en: a free Q-Bot Gen 6!
It's the best day of my life!
I love you, Justin!
Oh, yes!
He signed me! [laughs hysterically]
-[alert beeping] -Oh, no.
-Dr. Tanner Rice. -[Dr. Rice yelps]
-Justin. -You weren't at the launch.
No. What--
Was that today? Sorry about that. Just fixing some last-minute...
translation.de: Das war heute? Tut mir leid. Ich musste noch etwas fixen.

translation.en: Yeah, bugs with the data, software, production line.
translation.de: Fehler in den Daten, der Software, der Produktion.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just thinking, we don't want to release the Gen 6 too early.
translation.de: Wir sollten den Gen 6 nicht zu früh rausbringen.

translation.en: Hey, Ares. [stuttering] How's it hanging?
I mean, uh...
Hey, maybe a little more product testing. You know? For safety.
translation.de: Vielleicht noch ein paar Tests zur Sicherheit.

translation.en: [Justin] No, I understand that. The Gen 6 is your baby after all.
translation.de: Verstehe. Der Gen 6 ist schließlich dein Baby.

translation.en: [Dr. Rice] Well, I mean...
This one you did most of the updates.
translation.de: Die meisten Updates sind von dir.

translation.en: -Definitely more your-- -You're a perfectionist and I get that.
translation.de: -Eher dein... -Du bist Perfektionist, und das ist okay.

translation.en: I really do and I'm supportive. But realize,
translation.de: Ich unterstütze dich. Aber du sollst wissen,

translation.en: we've made something revolutionary here.
translation.de: dass das hier etwas Revolutionäres ist.

translation.en: Trust me. It's ready.
-Yeah, I just-- -Come on, say it.
-Well that's the thing-- -Say it.
It's ready.
See? Was that so hard?
-[Dr. Rice] Okay. -[flying robot] Is this a bad time?
What? No. Yes. Yes.
-This is a terrible time. -Okay. Well, got some bad news.
Your secret robot just walked out of your secret lab--
translation.de: Ihr Geheimroboter verließ gerade Ihr Geheimlabor...

translation.en: What? Shh! Is that a joke?
translation.de: Was? Soll das ein Witz sein?

translation.en: No, a joke would be, "Why did a secret robot cross the road?"
translation.de: Nein, ein Witz wäre: Warum überquerte der Geheimroboter die Straße?

translation.en: -It's less of a joke, but-- -Not now.
Wait, there's another one. Knock, knock.
translation.de: Hier ist noch einer. Klopf, klopf...

translation.en: Oh! Oh, my--
Oh, no!
All right then, you're doing okay. I will leave you to it.
translation.de: Es geht Ihnen also gut. Ich werde jetzt gehen.

translation.en: [P.A.] The red zone is for immediate loading and off-loading of passengers and robots only.
translation.de: Die rote Zone ist zum Be- und Entladen von Passagieren und Robotern.

translation.en: No parking.
What is that?
[P.A.] The red zone is for immediate loading and off-loading of passengers and robots only.
translation.de: Die rote Zone ist zum Be- und Entladen von Passagieren und Robotern.

translation.en: No parking.
[Molly] Didn't you have a backpack, honey?
Listen, champ. You're definitely not allowed out here.
translation.de: Hör zu. Du darfst hier nicht lang.

translation.en: That girl needs this bag. We're going to hang out,
translation.de: Das Mädchen braucht die Tasche. Wir hängen rum, werden Freunde und gehen auf Entdeckungsreise.

translation.en: become best buds and share a meaningful journey of discovery.
translation.de: Wir hängen rum, werden Freunde und gehen auf Entdeckungsreise.

translation.en: [security robot] Why don't we go ahead and get you back inside?
-[security robot] Protocol's the word. Come on.
[security] Oh, that's interesting.
[big robot] I'm delusional.
Uhm... Fellas, I think we're going to need some backup.
[police dispatcher] Attention GHP units. Please be advised, unidentified robot on CS-101
translation.de: An alle GHP-Einheiten. Unbekannter Roboter auf CS101.

translation.en: moving west in high speed.
All units are assumed to apprehend.
Units 14 and 18 responding.
[officer] You are in violation of traffic offense.
Pull over immediately and submit.
-But there's a tiny pointed horse in here! -Irrelevant.
[officer] Pull over immediately and--
[officer] Pull over immediately. You are in violation of major--
translation.de: Fahren Sie rechts ran, Sie haben...

translation.en: [officer] You are in violation--
[low-pitched vehicle] The Department of Freeland Security
has authorized the use of deadly force. Stop engine and power down immediately.
translation.de: Wir haben Erlaubnis Sie auszuschalten. Halten Sie sofort an.

translation.en: [low-pitched vehicle] Cease and desist.
[motherboard] Core memory, fatal error. Current memory will fill in 72 hours.
translation.de: Hauptspeicher, unbehebbarer Fehler. Speicher voll in 72 Stunden.

translation.en: Error code: Bio HT816.
Contact your local IQ Geek Kit to recycle this robot
translation.de: Sprechen Sie mit ihrem IQ Geek Kit, um den Roboter zu recyceln und seien Sie

translation.en: and please be more careful in the future.
translation.de: Sprechen Sie mit ihrem IQ Geek Kit, um den Roboter zu recyceln und seien Sie in Zukunft vorsichtiger.

translation.en: Instead, it will conform to the geometry of its container.
translation.de: Also passt es sich der Form seines Behälters an.

translation.en: E.g. put it in a cup, it becomes a cup. Put it in a teapot, it becomes a teapot.
translation.de: In einer Tasse wird es zu einer Tasse, in einer Kanne eine Kanne.

translation.en: And this water equivalent...
-I'm going to barf! -[boy] Dude.
[girl] It's like limited edition.
Water can drift gently or it can crash violently.
This variability and flexibility is something we have to consider.
translation.de: Diese Fähigkeit und Flexibilität müssen wir berücksichtigen.

translation.en: -Varying contexts demand varying behavior. -[sighs]
[Mai] S-Sorry.
[girl] No problem.
You on the school team?
-Who's asking? -I'm Ani.
It's nice to meet you. You know, officially.
We have physics together, but I sit behind you,
translation.de: Ich sitze in Physik hinter dir,

translation.en: so I don't think you've actually seen me.
translation.de: du hast mich aber wohl noch nie gesehen.

translation.en: So... What?
Do you just hang out here? Are you...
translation.de: Hängst du hier rum? Bist du...

translation.en: weird or something?
Yeah, maybe. I guess.
I come out to read. All the time, actu--
-Passing lane. -[big boy] Out of the way.
[girl] That's right.
[boy] Yeah, move it.
Why'd you nerds think you can hang out on my field?
translation.de: Was macht ihr auf meinem Feld?

translation.en: It's not your field, Greenwood!
translation.de: Es ist nicht dein Feld, Greenwood.

translation.en: -[girl] Yeah, it is. -Really?
-[boy] She doesn't even have a Q-Bot. -Hey, who taught you how to play?
translation.de: -Sie hat nicht einmal einen Q-Bot. -Wer brachte dir Spielen bei?

translation.en: Was it your dad?
[Greenwood] Oh, yeah. He's gone, isn't he?
translation.de: Ach ja, der ist ja tot.

translation.en: Okay, East Lake Energy. Passing drills. Come on, move it.
translation.de: East Lake Energy. Passübungen. Bewegt euch.

translation.en: [boy] We did those yesterday.
Hey, Mai. Why don't we get out-- Oh, okay. There she goes.
translation.de: Mai, warum gehen wir nicht... Oh. Weg ist sie.

translation.en: Yo, Greenwood.
What was that?
Take her down.
[Q-Bot] Copy that.
-[girl] It's going down now. -Ma'am, if you'll allow me.
translation.de: Jetzt gibt's Ärger. Wenn ich bitten dürfte.

translation.en: -You just try it. -[kid] Go get her.
Smash her!
I'm told that if you go limp, you'll sustain less damage as we beat you.
translation.de: Man soll bei Prügeleien weniger Schaden nehmen, wenn man sich fügt.

translation.en: -Good luck. -[kid] Come on, bring it!
No!
Robots.
Hey!
-Nope. -[toilet] Oh, come on!
You've got mail, you've got mail, you've got mail, you've got--
mail.
[door] Hey, good afternoon, Mai. I bet you had a great day.
translation.de: GENERIERE BEGRÜSSUNG Hallo, Mai. Du hattest sicher einen tollen Tag.

translation.en: -You like... -Die in a fire.
[door] Okie dokie, good talk.
Not now, Momo.
[Molly] Mai? I'm almost done, then I'll fix dinner.
translation.de: Mai? Ich bin fast fertig, dann koche ich.

translation.en: [Q-Bot] Gravity is your friend.
Look out, here comes a black-horned rhino!
How was your day?
[Mai] I killed a man for his boots.
That's great, honey. That's great.
[bowl singing] It's noodle time! I can't wait for--
translation.de: Es ist Nudelzeit! Ich kann es kaum...

translation.en: [bowl] Mm. It's good, right?
Stupid! [groans]
[Q-Bot] Stroke, stroke.
Mai, honey?
I said I was making dinner.
I'm not hungry, Mom.
Oh, so that's how it is?
Are you going to at least look at me when you're being all teenagery?
translation.de: Siehst du mich wenigstens an, wenn du so motzig bist?

translation.en: [Mai] Okay, I am sorry.
Can I go now?
What happened?
I had a really bad day, okay?
Those kids are making fun of you again?
I know.
It's hard.
I feel alone sometimes too,
translation.de: Ich fühle mich auch manchmal einsam,

translation.en: but only sometimes.
You know why, right?
You're never alone when you've got a Q-Bot!
translation.de: Denn man ist nie allein mit einem Q-Bot!

translation.en: Don't you understand anything?
Mmm... Sandlewood.
Hey there, Molly. I've finish the vacuuming.
There's a rather lovely Merlot and a piping hot lava cake waiting.
translation.de: Ein Merlot und Schokokuchen warten auf dich.

translation.en: Maybe a foot rub later?
Let's see, are we missing anything?
translation.de: Mal sehen, habe ich etwas vergessen?

translation.en: We both are.
You understand me, don't you, buddy?
You understand my unfocused rage. Yeah, you do.
translation.de: Du verstehst meinen Ärger. Das tust du.

translation.en: Yeah, you're the only one who gets my rage.
translation.de: Du bist der Einzige, der meinen Ärger versteht.

translation.en: [Alfredo] Thanks for going through the garbage.
translation.de: "Danke, dass du den Müll durchsuchst, Alfredo."

translation.en: Oh, no problem at all, Dr. Rice. My pleasure.
[door] Wow, thank you for opening me!
Oh, look out. Here I go closing.
[in English] Get the [bleep] out here. I will bite your head off, [bleep].
translation.de: Ich beiß dir den Kopf ab.

translation.en: This is Momo's house!
[robot] Hello, small rodent.
Small who?
Momo, quit it! Get in here.
What? You again?
My bag! What are you doing here?
translation.de: Meine Tasche! Was tust du hier?

translation.en: -Who even are you? -I'm the stupid robot.
That may be the only honest thing I've ever heard a robot say, actually.
translation.de: Das ist wohl das einzig Ehrliche, was ein Roboter je sagte.

translation.en: But, you've got to go. I have bigger problems to deal with.
translation.de: Aber du musst gehen. Ich hab genug Probleme.

translation.en: I don't want you here.
Don't you-- Don't you get it?
I hate robots!
I really enjoyed looking through your personal belongings.
translation.de: Es war toll, deine Sachen zu durchsuchen.

translation.en: You're still super creepy.
Would you please just go?
[Molly] Mai, don't forget to brush your teeth before bed.
Four out of five dentists recommend me!
translation.de: Vier von fünf Zahnärzten empfehlen mich!

translation.en: Stupid parental settings!
[brush] Floss twice a day.
-Hey! -[laser zaps]
Tartar kills. Floss.
Holy mother of toast!
Wait, wait, wait! Wait a second.
What was that exactly?
A phased plasma rifle in the 40GW range.
-Are you sure that's legal? -Legal?
So, why'd you track me down again?
You said you needed your bag.
Well, what do you say we make a deal?
translation.de: Was hältst du von einem Deal?

translation.en: I don't know. What do I say?
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Was halte ich davon?

translation.en: Okay, listen. You're gonna stay here tonight.
Understand?
Stay.
Not you, Momo.
I knew that. You judging me, bro?
I can keep this?
Well, if you do me a solid.
translation.de: Wenn du mir einen Gefallen tust,

translation.en: You can keep it.
-Come on, Momo. -He's judging me.
Now, get some rest or whatever it is that robots do.
translation.de: Schlaf jetzt oder was auch immer Roboter tun.

translation.en: We're going to have a big day tomorrow.
[Momo] You see that? I see you judging me!
translation.de: Ich sehe, wie du mich verurteilst!

translation.en: [motherboard] Warning. Current memory will fill in 48 hours.
Recommendation: delete overflow memory to clear space and avoid input lock.
translation.de: Empfehlung: Lösche überflüssigen Speicher, um Input-Sperre zu vermeiden.

translation.en: Who's out there? I swear, [bleep].
I will bite your head off--
translation.de: Ich beiß dir den Kopf ab.

translation.en: Space cleared. Warning: core memory fail error.
translation.de: Platz freigegeben. Warnung: Fehler im Hauptspeicher.

translation.en: Current memory will fill in 51 hours.
[Dr. Rice] Oh.
You know I created you, right?
Oh, hey. Justin. Sorry.
[stuttering] Something-- Something wrong with the line?
No, no!
Just wanted a little check in, that's all.
There was an incident today.
-On the freeway. -Oh, well then--
With an unsanctioned robot of your design.
translation.de: Mit einem unbekannten Roboter deines Designs.

translation.en: I'm curious. Are we not giving you enough to do?
translation.de: Hast du nicht genug zu tun?

translation.en: -No, no. -We're not?
Wait, I mean...
Yes. All right, look, okay. I can explain.
translation.de: Ja. Okay. Ich kann es erklären.

translation.en: Don't bother, I like to think I've been pretty relaxed about your side projects.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, ich bin entspannt, was deine Projekte angeht.

translation.en: Yeah, I think it's just great that you keep pushing me.
translation.de: Es ist toll, dass du mich immer weiter anstößt.

translation.en: But I need you to be concentrating on the Gen 6.
translation.de: Aber du musst dich auf den Gen 6 konzentrieren.

translation.en: -[robot] Hey, guys. -Remember, one in every home.
No, I know, I know. My mind has been a little--
No more side projects, no more distractions.
translation.de: Keine Projekte mehr, keine Ablenkungen mehr.

translation.en: -Think of that. -It won't be a problem anymore.
There you go.
The only robots I want making news, doctor, are the Q-Bots.
translation.de: Die einzigen Roboter, die Schlagzeilen schreiben sollen, sind die Q-Bots.

translation.en: Yeah, I just--
"One in every home."
-Show them what you've got. -What are you waiting for?
[girl] Almost there, come on.
Come on!
Take the shot!
What?
-What? -[kid] Who shot that?
[Mai] 'Sup, fools.
Have you got a short memory or something, Su?
[all Q-Bots] On the bright side, it's a really beautiful day for a beating.
translation.de: Andererseits ist es ein schöner Tag für eine Prügelei.

translation.en: It sure is.
-Say the thing. -Oh, right.
You best not be stepping to me, bruh.
translation.de: Leg dich nicht mit mir an, Bruder.

translation.en: "Bruh?"
You think this is a game?
No, this is payback.
I mean, well, this is a game. But, you know.
translation.de: Na ja, es ist ein Spiel. Aber, du weißt schon.

translation.en: Whatever, get her off my field.
What do you say? Three rounds, nothing in the face?
Wow, nice catch.
-What was that? -What's going on?!
My robot!
Boom.
[kid] Is this what karma feels like?
That's what I'm talking about. Woohoo!
Thank you.
Did I... do you a solid?
Is our deal done?
-We're not done. -We're not?
We're just getting started.
Yeah.
♪ 'Cause we only got one life to live I'm on a psychic safari ♪
[host] Welcome back to the big show!
It's me, Wang Nima.
-Thank you. -[woman] You're awesome, Justin!
We're back with IQ Robotic's CEO, Justin Pin.
translation.de: Wir sind zurück mit dem CEO von IQ Robotik, Justin Pin.

translation.en: Talking about this little guy, the new Q-Bot Gen 6.
translation.de: Und natürlich mit diesem Kerl, dem neuen Q-Bot Gen 6.

translation.en: [Wang Nima] Wow!
Well, I know I'm going to run right out and pick mine up.
translation.de: Ich werde mir meinen auch gleich holen.

translation.en: Oh, that's good.
Hey, Justin. Changing subject for a second,
-I have a question. -I'm all ears.
Have you heard about this robot rampage on the freeway?
translation.de: Hast du von der Roboter-Randale auf der Autobahn gehört?

translation.en: Word is, it looks like one of your robots was doing all the damage.
translation.de: Es scheint, einer deiner Roboter verursachte den Schaden.

translation.en: Well, I mean, we've got a lot going on these days.
translation.de: Wir haben gerade viel zu tun.

translation.en: But yes, of course, I have heard about this tragic event.
translation.de: Aber ich hörte von dem Vorfall.

translation.en: I've been assured by my people as well as the proper authorities,
translation.de: Doch Mitarbeiter und Polizei teilten mir mit,

translation.en: this dangerous and counterfeit robot has been destroyed.
translation.de: dass dieser gefährliche Roboter zerstört wurde.

translation.en: It is 100%, definitely, you can take it to the bank, dead.
Oh, I see. It's dead. Oh, poor little guy.
-Play the clip! -What? I don't have-- Oh you--
[woman] What is happening? Oh!
Wow, this is-- I'm seeing this footage for the first time.
translation.de: Ich... Ich sehe das zum ersten Mal.

translation.en: That's very out of character for our robots. Don't you think?
translation.de: Ziemlich untypisch für unsere Roboter, nicht?

translation.en: Oh, I mean look at that. That's not--
translation.de: Seht euch das an. Das ist nicht...

translation.en: That's horrible.
So, you're telling me, it's not an IQ Robot?
Oh, good Lord, no!
No, our operation is perfect.
-Oh. -Okay? I would never allow
something like that to come out of IQ.
No, no, no. Besides, we're a little more into connecting people.
translation.de: Nein. Außerdem wollen wir Menschen verbinden

translation.en: than taking them apart.
Give it up for Justin Pin, everybody.
-[man] Go Justin! -[girl] I love him!
And I was like, "You want a piece of [bleep]?"
And then, bam! Scrap metal! You don't [bleep] with Momo, son!
translation.de: Und dann bum! Schrott! Leg dich nicht mit Momo an!

translation.en: I love this [bleep] thing.
You know, there's something wrong with your small mammal.
translation.de: Mit deinem kleinen Säugetier stimmt etwas nicht.

translation.en: He likes you, no big deal.
-Have we met? -Oh, you don't remember me.
I don't remember you too, bruh.
-What's that? -Oh, this? This is nothing.
-Why do you ask? -[motherboard] Warning, memory low.
Anyway, goodnight.
Hey, is something wrong?
You should go to bed. Your mom will worry.
translation.de: Geh besser. Deine Mom wird sich Sorgen machen.

translation.en: Nice try, dude. Come on, what's up?
Woah!
[motherboard] Warning: current memory will fill in 18 hours.
Recommendation: clear space to avoid catastrophic system reset.
translation.de: Empfehlung: Platz freigeben, um System-Reset zu verhindern.

translation.en: That sounds bad. Is that bad?
Well, I'm broken.
If my storage gets too full, I won't be able to make new memories
translation.de: Ist mein Speicher zu voll, kann ich keine Erinnerungen behalten,

translation.en: and my brain will shut down.
Well what about that? Can't you get rid of all that stuff?
translation.de: Was ist damit? Kann das nicht weg?

translation.en: That stuff? No, those are my core systems.
translation.de: Das? Nein, das ist mein Kern-System.

translation.en: I'd gain storage, but I'd lose functionality.
translation.de: Ich bekäme Speicher, würde aber Funktionalität verlieren.

translation.en: Oh, man. That's rough. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Das ist hart. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: It's fine, I just delete a few memories every night.
translation.de: Ich lösche jeden Abend ein paar Erinnerungen.

translation.en: -That way, I don't lose them all. -How do you know which to keep?
translation.de: -So verliere ich nicht alle. -Welche behältst du?

translation.en: Well, I keep the important ones.
But the real problem is, the more memories I make,
translation.de: Doch je mehr Erinnerungen ich habe,

translation.en: the harder it is to choose what to forget.
Let me help.
I'm pretty sure there are things not worth remembering.
translation.de: Es gibt sicher Dinge, die du vergessen kannst.

translation.en: Really?
Okay, then.
What would you delete if you had to choose?
Oh, wait. Play that one.
No, you're the stupid robot.
There you go, delete that one.
But that memory's special.
We'd just met.
How come no one every told me I have an ugly mad face?
I can't delete that.
-It's you, Mai. -That's not me!
If you delete that memory, I'll still be here.
translation.de: Wenn du sie löschst, bin ich immer noch hier.

translation.en: We can make some other ones, it'll be cool. Trust me.
translation.de: Wir schaffen andere Erinnerungen, vertrau mir.

translation.en: I trust you.
-[buzz] -[motherboard] Space cleared.
Does it hurt?
I don't know.
Once it's gone, there's nothing. Like it was never there.
translation.de: Wenn sie weg ist, fühlt es sich an, als wäre sie nie da gewesen.

translation.en: Like it was never there.
translation.de: Als wäre sie nie da gewesen.

translation.en: I'm being selfish. What about...
-Enough! -Don't. Matthew!
Mai, are you okay?
Are you hurt?
What? No, it's fine.
-[bottle shatters] -Goodnight, I guess.
Hey, keep it real, yo.
translation.de: He, bleib wie du bist, jo?

translation.en: You too. Keep it real.
translation.de: Du auch. Bleib wie du bist.

translation.en: Yo.
[Justin] Hey.
[Justin] Do you recognize this?
So, I'm just curious. You made this, right?
translation.de: Ich bin neugierig. Du hast ihn gemacht, oder?

translation.en: All by yourself, in your free time?
Look, I'm not mad about this. I mean, it's pretty cool, right there.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht wütend. Er ist ziemlich cool.

translation.en: I could really use a robot like that.
I mean you betrayed me and I have to kill you now
translation.de: Du hast mich betrogen, und ich bringe dich um,

translation.en: but I could-- No, no. Can you stop? Please, just listen.
translation.de: aber ich könnte... Hör bitte zu.

translation.en: I can't understand what you're saying. You know what, never mind.
translation.de: Ich verstehe dich nicht. Ach, vergiss es.

translation.en: He's alive. He's not dead.
translation.de: Er lebt. Er ist nicht tot.

translation.en: I mean, I could find the robot.
I could tap into the Q-Bot video feed, so we could see everything they all do.
translation.de: Mit dem Q-Bot-Video-Feed können wir alle sehen.

translation.en: All the Q-Bots everywhere. They'll be our eyes.
I'll find it!
One second.
Guys...
Let's do that then.
-[robot] Hello, small rodent. -[Momo yells]
-Good morning, Mai. -Oh! Hey, dude.
Woah, nice.
All right, so what do you want to do today?
We have a lot of options.
Hey, what's that?
This? A baseball bat.
What's it for?
You know, for hitting baseballs. It's a game.
translation.de: Um Bälle zu schlagen. Es ist ein Spiel.

translation.en: -Do people get hurt in baseball? -Depends on who's playing.
translation.de: Verletzt man sich dabei? Kommt auf die Spieler an.

translation.en: -Mai, I was thinking-- -[Mai] Hmm?
Well, maybe you and me, maybe we could play a game today.
translation.de: Vielleicht könnten wir beide heute ein Spiel spielen.

translation.en: You need to teach me. Maybe not baseball, probably, but...
translation.de: Du müsstest es mir beibringen. Vielleicht nicht Baseball, aber...

translation.en: Soccer or something? Something like that.
Why?
Oh, I just mean. What if...
We do one day where we don't, you know, blow stuff up.
Aren't you having a good time?
translation.de: Gefällt dir das nicht? Ich dachte, wir hätten Spaß

translation.en: I thought we were having a good time just hanging out.
translation.de: Gefällt dir das nicht? Ich dachte, wir hätten Spaß beim Rumhängen.

translation.en: No, no, we are. Are you kidding? It's the best.
translation.de: Das haben wir. Es ist das Beste.

translation.en: I really like hanging out.
It's been great, I have lots of cool memories now
translation.de: Es war toll, ich habe viele coole Erinnerungen

translation.en: -of us hanging out. -Okay, so why do you want to bail?
translation.de: -von uns beiden. -Warum willst du dann aufhören?

translation.en: -I don't! -Because we can't quit now.
There's way to much injustice in the world.
translation.de: -Will ich nicht! -Wir können nicht aufhören, weil es so viel Unrecht gibt, das wir zusammen fixen können.

translation.en: Like, together we can fix it.
translation.de: weil es so viel Unrecht gibt, das wir zusammen fixen können.

translation.en: So, nobody has to get hurt ever again.
translation.de: Damit niemand jemals wieder verletzt wird.

translation.en: I would never let you get hurt.
translation.de: Ich lasse nicht zu, dass dir jemand wehtut.

translation.en: Well, there you go. See?
[Dr. Rice] He's alive. Find the robot.
He's alive. Find the robot.
He's alive, find the robot. He's alive, find the robot. He's alive--
He's alive, find the robot. Okay.
translation.de: Er lebt. Finde den Roboter. Okay.

translation.en: Oh, of course! Find the girl,
then I find the robot.
[robot] Oh, they put a pizza place there.
[singing along] ♪ Don't you know it's noodle time ♪
♪ It's noodle ti-- ♪
-Coming through. -Ah!
Bye! Hey, why are you so mean to everyone?
Apologize.
Please accept my apologies, ma'am. She's quite the scamp, I dare say.
translation.de: Bitte verzeihen Sie vielmals. Sie ist ein Schlingel.

translation.en: Well, I guess it's no problem, really.
-[kids laugh] -[girl] Oh, yeah.
Again, so sorry.
Don't worry. I got this.
No, Mai. Really it's okay.
-You don't have to do this. -You want to try that again, Greenwood?
translation.de: -Tu das nicht. -Versuch es doch noch mal, Greenwood.

translation.en: Oh. Hello, Mai.
Where's your little friend?
It's time you jokers learned we don't take no smack off of nobody.
translation.de: Zeit, dass ihr Witzbolde lernt, dass man uns besser nicht schlägt.

translation.en: "Jokers?" "Smack?"
I totally understand what she's talking about.
translation.de: Ich verstehe total, wovon sie spricht.

translation.en: -Oh, no. -Attack!
-[kid] Look out! -Hey, it's the girl.
[punk rock music playing] ♪ Noodles! Noodle time ♪
Do something! Let's go!
Stop it. That's not fair.
[Mai] That's what I'm talking about.
-Get 'em! -Me? Woah, take it easy.
What are you doing?
-Blast her! -[Greenwood and robot] What?
-I can't do that. -No, I didn't mean kill her.
translation.de: -Das geht nicht. -Du sollst sie nicht töten.

translation.en: You know, beat her up. Something.
I want her to hurt like how she hurt me.
translation.de: Sie soll die gleichen Schmerzen wie ich spüren.

translation.en: No, Mai. You don't want that.
translation.de: Nein, Mai. Das willst du nicht.

translation.en: I mean, she's just a kid like you.
translation.de: Sie ist ein Kind wie du.

translation.en: Listen. I'm sorry, okay?
translation.de: Hör zu. Es tut mir leid.

translation.en: I wasn't doing anything.
What is wrong with you anyway, you crazy little freak? -[Mai grunts] -[Greenwood screams]
translation.de: Was stimmt nicht mit dir? Du kleiner Freak.

translation.en: [robot] Why are you so angry?
[Mai] What do you know about it?
You're just a stupid robot.
translation.de: Du bist bloß ein dämlicher Roboter.

translation.en: [robot] Maybe you and Greenwood can be friends?
I thought...
I thought you were my friend.
I am. I am your friend.
translation.de: Das bin ich. Ich bin dein Freund.

translation.en: -[clank] -Mai, wait!
[motherboard] Warning: current memory will fill in eight hours.
translation.de: Warnung: Speicher voll in acht Stunden.

translation.en: Recommendation: delete overflow memory to avoid catastrophic shut down.
translation.de: Empfehlung: überflüssigen Speicher löschen und Runterfahren verhindern.

translation.en: Seriously, you're running out of options here, buddy.
translation.de: Im Ernst, dir gehen die Optionen aus.

translation.en: [Mai] You're just a stupid robot.
translation.de: Du bist bloß ein dämlicher Roboter.

translation.en: [Mai] Blast her!
[motherboard] You're about to delete the weapons control system.
translation.de: Sie sind dabei, Ihr Waffenkontrollsystem zu löschen.

translation.en: This is a core system.
Weapons will be unavailable until full system reset.
translation.de: Waffen werden nicht verfügbar sein bis zum vollständigen Reset.

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
Yes.
Space cleared. Weapons inactive.
Hey, Mai.
You were right. I was able to delete my weapons and--
translation.de: Du hattest recht. Ich konnte meine Waffen löschen und...

translation.en: [sighs] Was I wrong?
Yep.
I guess he was just trying to help.
I don't know.
Look, you were wrong and he was right.
translation.de: Du lagst falsch und er richtig.

translation.en: I mean you were being a brat and he was trying to be a stand-up guy.
translation.de: Du warst eine Göre, und er versuchte, ein Freund zu sein.

translation.en: Good Lord, woman--
Sometimes, I think you're going to be my best and only friend forever.
translation.de: Manchmal denke ich, du wirst für immer mein einziger und bester Freund sein.

translation.en: At least you'll never leave me. Will you, buddy?
No you won't. Oh, no you won't.
translation.de: Nein, wirst du nicht. Oh nein.

translation.en: You know what, [bleep] that guy. He's dead to me.
translation.de: Der Kerl ist für mich gestorben.

translation.en: Oh! What's up, man?
How much did you just hear? Cause I was-- They were just jokes.
translation.de: Wie viel hast du gehört? Das war... Spaß.

translation.en: [robot] I made you a gift.
The most important parts of me...
are the memories of you.
It hurts when I lose them.
translation.de: Es tut weh, sie zu verlieren.

translation.en: You lost something too.
Listen,
would it help if I promise you I'll never let you down again?
translation.de: würde es helfen, wenn ich dir verspreche, dich nie wieder im Stich zu lassen?

translation.en: How can you promise something like that?
translation.de: Wie kannst du so etwas versprechen?

translation.en: People leave and there's nothing you can do about it.
translation.de: Leute gehen, und du kannst nichts tun.

translation.en: I don't know. You're probably right.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Du hast wohl recht.

translation.en: I do know I don't want to lose you.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß, dass ich dich nicht verlieren will.

translation.en: Then, maybe...
don't lose me.
Mai, if I lost you, I'd be lost too.
translation.de: Mai, ohne dich wäre auch ich verloren.

translation.en: So...
we cool?
-You got my back? -I do got your back.
translation.de: -Du stehst hinter mir? -Ich stehe hinter dir.

translation.en: Then, yeah, we cool.
Mom, don't freak out.
Look, I can explain.
I think you'd better get your robot, young lady.
translation.de: Hol besser deinen Roboter, junge Dame.

translation.en: -[whirring] -Okay, okay.
Optical CRT intact.
Brachial prismatic joints are fine.
Motor responses...
This is where you removed your memory storage unit.
Uh-huh. I'm broken.
Don't worry. I can fix it.
translation.de: -Ja. Ich bin kaputt. -Keine Sorge. Ich kann es fixen.

translation.en: This chip contains a full system restore point.
A disc image from when I first created you.
Run this and you'll be like new again. A fresh start.
translation.de: Damit wirst du wie neu. Ein neuer Start.

translation.en: Wait, a fresh start?
Does that mean I lose my memories?
-Woah, hands off hippy! -Mai, don't be cute.
-Want to tell me what this is all about? -This is Dr. Rice, Mai,
translation.de: -Worum geht es hier? -Das ist Dr. Rice,

translation.en: and that's his Q-Bot.
No, no. This isn't a Q-Bot. This is-- He is...
translation.de: Nein. Das ist kein Q-Bot. Das ist. Er ist...

translation.en: something special. He has a purpose.
translation.de: Er ist besonders. Er hat ein Ziel.

translation.en: [Q-Bot] Oh, I didn't know we were expecting company.
-Can I offer you a lava ca-- -[electric shock]
Woah, what are you doing?
translation.de: Möchten Sie etwas Kuchen? Was tun Sie?

translation.en: -Sorry, listen-- -[Q-Bot] Sandlewood.
Listen, something terrible is about to happen.
7723 is our only hope stopping it. I designed him to stop it.
translation.de: 7723 ist unsere einzige Hoffnung. Er wurde gebaut, um es aufzuhalten.

translation.en: -I get it. He's a weapon. -What?
-Why would you put weapons in a robot? -Because it's awesome.
translation.de: -Warum sollte ein Roboter Waffen haben? -Weil es toll ist.

translation.en: Awesome indeed.
I'm sorry, is now a bad time?
I mean, should I come back? I could always come back.
-Who is this? How'd you get in here? -Justin Pin?
translation.de: -Wer ist das? Woher kommt er? -Justin Pin.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. I'm a huge fan, I'm your biggest fan.
[chuckles] I'm a huge fan of you!
translation.de: Ich bin ein Fan von Ihnen.

translation.en: Ah, Dr, Tanner Rice here, really should be more careful with this secret project.
translation.de: Dr. Tanner Rice sollte vorsichtiger mit seinen Geheimprojekten sein.

translation.en: -Well this has been really great but-- -Justin.
My old friend. If you're in there, please hear me.
translation.de: Alter Freund. Wenn du da drin bist, hör mir zu.

translation.en: Don't you remember the old days?
Come on. Dude, it was so awesome!
I mean, building robots for the people.
Before Ares. Before all of this.
-[Q-Bot] Foot rub later? -[Dr. Rice] Come on. This isn't us.
Seriously, when did making the world a better place become killing people?
translation.de: Wann machte das Töten von Menschen die Welt zu einem besseren Ort?

translation.en: I actually think "killing people" is making the world a better place.
translation.de: Leute zu töten macht die Welt zu einem besseren Ort.

translation.en: But I'm glad that we have this out in the open.
translation.de: Aber gut, dass wir es angesprochen haben.

translation.en: Secrets hurt after all, right?
I think he wants to kill us.
translation.de: Ich glaube, er will uns töten.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Not you per say, but just people in general.
translation.de: Oh nein. Nicht bloß euch. Menschen im Allgemeinen.

translation.en: I want to kill them, all of them. Most of them.
translation.de: Ich will sie töten, alle. Die meisten.

translation.en: Whatever. Look, don't worry. Once it gets rolling,
translation.de: Was auch immer. Seid unbesorgt. Sobald es beginnt, geht alles sehr schnell.

translation.en: thinks will be happening really quickly.
translation.de: Seid unbesorgt. Sobald es beginnt, geht alles sehr schnell.

translation.en: Boom, boom, boom. Trust me, it will be fine.
translation.de: Bum. Glaubt mir, alles wird gut.

translation.en: -Justin Pin's a bad guy? -That explains a lot actually.
But he's messing with the wrong cute little robot.
translation.de: Aber er hat sich mit dem falschen Roboter angelegt.

translation.en: -Blast them! -I'm sorry, Mai. But I can't.
-What? -I--
-[swoosh] -[Molly] Mai, what is going on here?
You know what? That is a great question.
What is he doing?
[Mai] Use your guns! Use your plasma thingy.
Get back, it's not safe.
translation.de: Geh zurück, es ist nicht sicher.

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -Okay, fine.
Whose dog is this?
[Q-Bot] Hey, guys.
Did he just explode? We gotta go back, we gotta get mom.
translation.de: Ist er gerade explodiert? Wir müssen zurück zu Mom.

translation.en: [Molly] Mai!
-[army robot] Surround the target. -Why aren't you stopping to help her?
translation.de: -Umzingelt das Ziel. -Was tust du? Warum hältst du an? Rette sie!

translation.en: No!
Wow, what a scuffle. It looks--
translation.de: Was für ein Handgemenge. Sieht aus...

translation.en: Put me down! Stop, just stop!
What is wrong with you?
They took my mom!
I'm sorry, I couldn't stop them.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich konnte sie nicht aufhalten.

translation.en: This is how you got my back?
translation.de: So stehst du also hinter mir?

translation.en: I thought you were some kind of superhero.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du wärst so was wie ein Superheld.

translation.en: But you just stood by and let them take her.
translation.de: Aber du standest nur rum und hast es zugelassen.

translation.en: -You let them. -I didn't let them.
I had nothing to fight them with.
-What? -I deleted my weapon control systems.
What? Why would you do that?
Because I was out of memory.
There was nothing I could delete that wasn't you.
translation.de: Ich konnte die Erinnerungen an dich nicht löschen.

translation.en: Okay, so your precious robot memories
are more important than my mother's life? Is that it?
translation.de: wichtiger als das Leben meiner Mom?

translation.en: Is that what you're saying?
I hope that's not what you're saying.
I know I messed up,
but I had no choice. I had to save you.
translation.de: aber ich hatte keine Wahl. Ich musste dich retten.

translation.en: I can't lose you, Mai.
My parents are gone.
The second I believe this thing between us is real
translation.de: Da glaube ich gerade, dass das zwischen uns echt ist,

translation.en: you burn it down to the ground like everyone else does!
translation.de: und du brennst alles nieder wie alle anderen.

translation.en: Look, remember this.
I'm bailing first.
You okay, kiddo?
-I have you now, princess. -No!
-Get your hands off me. -Okay, come on--
Mai, don't do this by yourself.
-I don't need you. -Come on. Just listen to me.
translation.de: -Ich brauche dich nicht. -Bitte hör mir zu.

translation.en: Hi, you are in violation--
-Please stop fighting me. -[robot] Huh.
Mai, I'm trying to help.
[sarcastically] Oh, good! Weapons would help. Did you bring any weapons this time?
translation.de: Gut. Waffen würden helfen. Hast du welche dabei?

translation.en: -It doesn't work like that. -I don't know about you,
translation.de: -So geht das nicht. -Ich weiß nicht, wie es dir geht,

translation.en: but a rocket launcher would make me feel a whole lot better.
translation.de: aber mit einem Raketenwerfer würde ich mich viel besser fühlen.

translation.en: [7723] If I brought my weapons back online,
the process would purge my entire memory.
I'd forget everything I've ever learned.
[sarcastically] Oh, real tragedy.
-I wouldn't know who to fight anymore. -Whatever, I can fight alone.
translation.de: -Ich würde den Feind nicht kennen. -Dann kämpfe ich eben allein.

translation.en: -I've been doing it my whole life. -You are not alone!
translation.de: Wie immer. Du bist nicht allein!

translation.en: I'm always alone. This time-- -[sirens wailing] -This time's no different.
translation.de: Ich bin immer allein. Dieses Mal ist es nicht anders.

translation.en: [security robot] You are now surrounded--
You're right. I let you down.
translation.de: Du hast recht. Ich habe dich enttäuscht.

translation.en: A lot of people let you down, but you are not alone.
translation.de: Viele haben dich enttäuscht, aber du bist nicht allein.

translation.en: [Mai] If I'm not alone that means I've brought you down into my garbage life.
translation.de: Wenn ich nicht allein bin, dann hast auch du ein Müll-Leben.

translation.en: Is that really where you want to be?
translation.de: Ist es dort, wo du sein willst?

translation.en: [7723] Nowhere else.
I miss him.
Everyday.
And everyday, I'm mad at him for leaving.
translation.de: Und jeden Tag bin ich sauer, dass er fortging.

translation.en: Look at us.
Quite a team we make-- A broken robot and a broken little girl.
translation.de: Was für ein Team, ein kaputter Roboter und ein kaputtes Mädchen.

translation.en: It's more than I could have ever asked for.
translation.de: Das ist mehr, als ich mir wünschen könnte.

translation.en: What do you say we go and get your mother? Together?
translation.de: Lass uns deine Mutter gemeinsam retten.

translation.en: We're going to get our butts kicked without your weapons.
-You know that, don't you? -Oh, yeah for sure.
[security robots] Violation. Alert. Alert.
-[7723] Let's go. Come on. -[sirens wailing]
-Momo! -What?
Alert. Alert.
-Hold up! You guys hear that? -[indistinct conversation in distance]
-Momo, shh! -[7723] Wait.
-[Momo] She's that way! -Momo said she's this way, come on.
translation.de: -Da lang. -Momo sagt, sie ist dort lang.

translation.en: Wait, Momo says?
"Momo says?"
I don't need that. I have a copy of that.
translation.de: Das nicht, davon habe ich eine Kopie.

translation.en: All right, maybe I can try that. Where did I see--
Where did I put it, I know I-- I have money.
translation.de: Wo ist es? Ich weiß... Nehmt mein Geld!

translation.en: Oh, you're here. We're saved!
translation.de: Oh, du bist hier. Wir sind in Sicherheit.

translation.en: Hey, hey! Guys, wait. Oh, goodness.
Where's my mom, nerd shirt?
Ignore that, that's a trap.
translation.de: Ignorier das, es ist eine Falle.

translation.en: -There's no way I'll ignore that. -No, listen.
We can save your mother.
We can save everybody, but we have to stop Ares to do it.
translation.de: Wir können alle retten, aber wir müssen Ares aufhalten.

translation.en: What? Who cares about Ares if that Justin Pin guy is the problem?
translation.de: Wen interessiert Ares, wenn Justin Pin das Problem ist?

translation.en: No, you don't understand. It's not Pin.
translation.de: Du verstehst es nicht. Es ist nicht Pin.

translation.en: He isn't...
I mean he...
He lost all patience for tedious backstory?
translation.de: Er hat keine Geduld für langweilige Geschichten?

translation.en: Yeah? [laughs]
These guys again?
I think that's just about enough, Dr. Tanner Rice.
translation.de: Ich denke, das reicht, Dr. Tanner Rice.

translation.en: Tell me where you're keeping my mother!
Oh, right. The human woman. Oh my gosh.
I had created the perfect trap for you guys.
-Hold up. -What?
What do you mean human woman?
translation.de: Was meinen Sie mit menschliche Frau?

translation.en: What? What do you mean, what do I mean?
I mean, who talks like that?
Normal humans do. [chuckles nervously] [stuttering] I mean, I do. Because I do normal human things
translation.de: Normale Menschen. So wie ich, weil ich normale Menschendinge tue.

translation.en: all the time. All the time.
Literally, you could ask any other human if I--
You won't get away with this. He can't hide forever.
translation.de: Das ist genug. Du kannst dich nicht ewig verstecken.

translation.en: -You know, people will find out-- -[zapping]
-You know what, never mind. -No!
[robot, low-pitched voice] Now it's time to finish this. [flying robot] All right, Dr. Rice. Time to go.
translation.de: -Zeit es zu beenden. -Richtig, Dr. Rice, Zeit zu gehen.

translation.en: You said two minutes, it's been two minutes.
translation.de: Sie sagten zwei Minuten, vor zwei Minuten.

translation.en: Oh, hey Ares.
[Mai] Nope.
-Give me a D! -[blast]
-[man] It's Justin! -[crowd whooping]
[7723] Oh, come on...
Oh, no!
-[robot] So, then I go back and get him-- -[Mai] Go get the cops!
translation.de: -Also gehe ich zurück und... -Ruf die Polizei!

translation.en: But Dr. Rice is dead. I have to take some time to process this.
translation.de: Aber Dr. Rice ist tot. Das muss ich erst verarbeiten.

translation.en: Okay, get the cops. Get the cops.
Momo, come on!
-[muffled] -Mom, are you okay?
Oh, Mai. My baby!
-Mom-- -I'm so sorry.
I should've paid more attention. You felt so all alone.
translation.de: Ich hätte auf dich achten sollen. Du warst einsam,

translation.en: I should've given you a hug, but I was alone too
translation.de: aber ich auch, und ich dachte,

translation.en: and thought robots were my answer. But you're my answer!
translation.de: Roboter wären die Antwort. Aber du bist meine Antwort.

translation.en: I hope that I'm your answer. You were so right and I was wrong.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, ich bin deine Antwort. Du hattest recht, ich unrecht.

translation.en: I love you so, so much!
Wow, yeah. I love you too.
But listen, Pin wants to kill all these people
translation.de: Pin will alle da draußen umbringen.

translation.en: you need to help me get them out of here.
They're never going to believe you.
I am a beloved public figure.
And they do whatever I want them to.
translation.de: Sie tun alles, was ich will.

translation.en: [echoing over P.A.] These morons are lining up to pay for the bombs
translation.de: Sie stehen Schlange, um Bomben zu kaufen,

translation.en: I'm going to use to kill-- Hold on, wait a second.
translation.de: mit denen ich sie umbringen... Moment.

translation.en: Am I...
Am I hearing an echo?
Hello. Do you guys hear that? Can anyone else hear an echo?
translation.de: Hallo? Hört ihr das? Hört noch jemand ein Echo?

translation.en: Give me that!
[Mai] All of you, listen, now!
The Q-Bots are bombs!
Head for the exits. Why is no one running?
translation.de: Geht zum Ausgang. Wieso läuft niemand?

translation.en: Run, right now! Get away while you can!
Ah! You. Are. A. Mean. Puppet!
Oh, why did you do that? [low-pitched] I'm just trying to help!
translation.de: Warum tust du das? Ich will bloß helfen!

translation.en: No, no!
Okay, fine! I killed Justin Pin and stole his body.
translation.de: Okay. Ich habe Justin Pin getötet und seinen Körper geklaut.

translation.en: Boo!
[Justin and Ares voices in unison] "Boo-hoo!" Shut up!
The guy's dead. Get over it!
translation.de: Er ist tot. Reißt euch zusammen.

translation.en: You know what he said to me? "You're perfect," he said.
translation.de: Wisst ihr, was er mir sagte? "Du bist perfekt.

translation.en: "Now go make the world perfect."
You want the world to be a better place?
translation.de: Die Welt soll ein besserer Ort sein?

translation.en: You humans are what's wrong with it.
-You're flawed and you're broken. -Keep talking, crazy pants.
translation.de: -Ihr habt Fehler und seid kaputt. -Red weiter, Schwachkopf.

translation.en: [Justin] The only way this world gets perfect...
translation.de: Der einzige Weg zu einer perfekten Welt

translation.en: is with all of you dead!
translation.de: ist der Tod von euch allen!

translation.en: Maybe I'll start with killing this one?
translation.de: Das hier wäre ein guter Start.

translation.en: Get your hands off of her!
Put your [bleep] finger on my daughter--
[Ares] I guess I don't have to wear the man's suit anymore.
translation.de: Den Menschen muss ich wohl nicht mehr tragen.

translation.en: Let's just scrub ahead to the everyone dies part, shall we?
translation.de: Lasst uns zum Teil vorspulen, in dem alle sterben, ja?

translation.en: Have at it!
Don't leave yet. [zapping]
Oh, snap!
-Momo, come on. -[barks]
-You just lost a very loyal customer! -Okay, Mom.
translation.de: -Sie haben eine treue Kundin verloren! -Okay, Mom.

translation.en: [Justin] Every home. Gorgeous.
Oh, my god! Mai, I've never felt so close to you.
translation.de: Ich habe mich dir noch nie so nah gefühlt, Mai.

translation.en: -Ah! Mai! -Mom!
-[Greenwood] Ah! Stay away, you freaks! -[Mai] Heads up!
[Greenwood] That was amazing!
-Yeah, cool. -Mai, I'm sorry about what happened.
Okay? I didn't mean to hurt you or anybody.
-And I know you weren't-- -Can we do this later?
All right, okay.
[Mai] Follow me, it's our last chance!
translation.de: Mir nach. Das ist unsere letzte Chance.

translation.en: [man] Look out! Hurry up!
[Mai] Come on!
Ow!
-Mai, what are you doing? Come on! -I'm going back for them.
translation.de: Mai, was tust du? Ich gehe zurück.

translation.en: Hello, pr-pr-princess.
All right.
You don't have to fight.
It never stops...
and it never fixes anything.
[Ares] You have been ruined by that human child.
Humans are the imperfection I mean to correct.
translation.de: Menschen sind die Fehler, die ich korrigieren muss.

translation.en: No one is perfect!
[Ares] I am!
[Ares] Don't you get it?
You're as broken as they are.
translation.de: Du bist so kaputt wie sie.

translation.en: But my world... My world will be perfect.
No more pain, no more conflict.
No more injustice.
No humanity.
You are very evil.
[Ares] Ah, agree to disagree.
Oh, hey. Look what the meat puppet dragged in.
You are not ruining this for me.
translation.de: Du machst mir das nicht kaputt.

translation.en: [Greenwood] Let her go, you weird old dude.
-Don't make me kick your butt. -Greenwood, what are you doing?
translation.de: -Sonst verprügel ich dich. -Greenwood, was tust du?

translation.en: Get out of here, go!
I am a stupid robot!
[motherboard] Warning, you are about to begin a full system reset.
translation.de: Gefahr, Sie sind dabei, einen kompletten System-Reset durchzuführen.

translation.en: All memories will be lost.
-Are you sure you want to do this? -[7723] Yes.
[motherboard] Beginning now. Memory deleted.
Weapons available.
[7723] I've got your back.
Holy crab stacks.
-Thank you. -Mai, listen to me.
Our memories make us who we are.
translation.de: Erinnerungen machen uns zu dem, wer wir sind.

translation.en: Don't let the bad ones stop you from making good ones.
translation.de: Die schlechten sollten dich nicht aufhalten, gute zu schaffen.

translation.en: [slow-motion] What are you talking about?
[motherboard] Memories deleting.
Weapons restoring.
Are you okay?
Look out!
Your weapons...
[7723] You are amazing. Go make new memories.
translation.de: Du bist toll. Schaff neue Erinnerungen.

translation.en: [Ares] Stop wasting your time.
[Mai] What-- What are you...
No!
[motherboard echoing] Memories deleting.
[motherboard] Full system reset successful, main memory initialized.
Hey!
Are you there?
Please come back. I'm-I'm sorry, I-I was wrong.
translation.de: Bitte komm zurück. Es tut mir leid, ich lag falsch.

translation.en: Please, please. Don't be gone.
Aw, stop it.
You're going to make me cry.
Not really. [digital stutter] I'm kidding.
Move aside little human.
No, don't! Stay away from him.
translation.de: Nein! Bleiben Sie weg von ihm.

translation.en: No! You do not get to touch him.
translation.de: Nein! Fassen Sie ihn nicht an.

translation.en: [Ares] What is it with you people? It's like you thrive on futility.
translation.de: Was mögt ihr Menschen nur so sehr an Sinnlosigkeit?

translation.en: -[gun energizes] -There we go.
Oh, well.
Perfect.
-[Momo barks, growls] -Hey!
What are you--
-Whose dog is this? -[Mai] He's mine!
You stupid robot!
-What? -Don't!
Oh, no!
You were trying to tell me and I...
Those memories were all you had and...
translation.de: Die Erinnerungen waren alles, was du hattest und...

translation.en: You gave them up, for me.
And I'm sorry.
Just please...
Don't be gone.
Hello. What's your name?
-[sobbing] -[Molly] Oh, honey...
-I can keep this? -You can keep it.
Hey, Momo. This is Momo.
-He's a good guy, okay? -Okay.
-Hello, Momo. -S'up, buddy?
Hey, sweetie.
How's he doing?
Better.
I think.
No! No, no, no!
It's okay, you're okay.
I've got your back.
"I got your back."
Oh, man.
What? I'm allergic to pollen. Are you judging me?
translation.de: Was? Ich hab eine Pollenallergie. Verurteile mich nicht.

translation.en: -Hey, Mai. You ready? -Oh hey, dude!
You girls have fun now.
Come on, let's go.
Mai, what are you waiting for? You ready?
translation.de: Worauf wartest du, Mai? Seid ihr bereit?

translation.en: [Momo] It's from generations of inbreeds. My ancestors were wolves, bruh.
translation.de: Das kam durch Generationen der Inzucht. Meine Vorfahren waren Wölfe.

translation.en: Come on!
[Greenwood] You can play too, but hurry it up.
-[girl] Bring it. -[boy] I'll be the goalie.
[Ani] Over here.
[Greenwood] You're good, but not as good as me.
translation.de: Du bist gut, aber nicht so gut wie ich.

translation.en: -Nice try. -I'm open!
[kid] He's so cool!
translation.de: Er ist so cool! Wie nennst du ihn?

translation.en: -What do you call him? -[Mai] My friend.
translation.de: Er ist so cool! Wie nennst du ihn? Meinen Freund.

translation.en: ♪ I forced my feet down to the floor ♪
